name: ADARSH GRAMODYOG VIKAS SANSTHAN
briefDescription: OUR ORIGINATION IS WORKING FROM 1991 WITH WOMEN EMPOWERMENT PROGRAM THROUGH LITERACY, IGP GROUP FORMATION, CHILDREN PROGRAM, HEALTH PROGRAM, AWARENESS PROGRAM, VOCATIONAL TRAINING IN SAIDPUR BLOCK OF GHAZIPUR DISTRICT UNDER UPHSDP IN 2005-2007 OUR DIRECT BENEFICIARY FROM ALL SECTOR 6900 AND INDIRECT 13800 NEAR ABOUT ATTACHED WITH.
